entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Weyburn
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 8:56 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High zero.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:56 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 8:56 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
